version_history.change: Initial portfolio overlay: sleeve allocation bands + circuit breaker + action constraints (risk-off mode).

sleeves.role: Structural Growth + Scarcity Rents + Inflation/Real-Asset Hedge

circuit_breaker.name: multi-thesis_red_circuit_breaker
circuit_breaker.trigger_condition: If >=2 theses enter RED status or 'kill_proximity' escalation within the same 7-day window

allowed_actions: Pause adds in all risk-on sleeves (AI, Crypto, Energy)
Reduce exposure toward lower end of target bands
Add hedges/overlays consistent with each thesis implementation section
Increase cash or short-duration defensive exposure (outside theses) as temporary buffer
disallowed_actions: Increase gross exposure in risk-on sleeves
Add new satellite positions in Crypto/AI/Energy
risk_off_mode_rules.exit_condition: Return to normal mode only when fewer than 2 theses remain RED for 14 consecutive days

governance.overlap_rule: If an instrument is held across multiple theses, it must be CORE in at most one thesis; others must treat it as SATELLITE or exclude it explicitly.
governance.large_change_guardrail: Any single action changing exposure by >3% of AUM requires 48-hour cool-off + written one-pager.
